entities.name: riddikulus
entities.description: A spell used to turn people back into their human form from a werewolf, described as being shouted by Mrs. Weasley and Lupin.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley's body is seen on the floor with blood running down his face, indicating he has been killed by a Cruciatus Curse.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill's body is initially seen on the floor before being replaced by Mr. Weasley's body.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry's dead body is seen on the floor, and he later comes back to life after Lupin casts the Riddikulus spell.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy's dead body is mentioned as being seen on the floor, but not described in detail.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin comes into the room and casts the Riddikulus spell to bring Harry back to life.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius follows Lupin into the room, but does not play a significant role in this scene.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody stumps along behind Lupin and Sirius, but does not participate in the events of this scene.

relationships.description: Lupin casts the Riddikulus spell to bring Harry back to life.
Lupin saves Harry's life by casting the Riddikulus spell.
